text: Ko Kyung-hi (Korean: 고경히, born August 1937) is a North Korean former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Kyung-hi represented her nation twice at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women. In 1965, finishing 19th overall and in 1967,Inschrijving van wereldkampioenschap schaatsen dames, de Stem, 15 February 1967, p.13 finishing 29th overall. She also competed at another international competition. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:North Korean female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Ko Kyung-hi
